item.title: Beogram 4002: Restoration of a Very Oily DC Platter Motor
item.description:
I obtained a Beogram 4002 DC platter motor from Berlin, Germany, for restoration. The motor’s exterior was noticeably oily, likely due to an attempt to improve its RPM stability through lubrication. Disassembly was necessary to access and treat the bearings. The motor’s interior was also oil-coated. However, this is ineffective for the bearings, as they require vacuum oil infusion. This process removes air trapped within the porous Oilite brass material, enabling new oil to penetrate the bearing effectively...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-restoration-of-a-very-oily-dc-platter-motor/
